title: The rate of change is the slope $$m$$ of C(n), which is $$0.1$$. This means that the cost increases by $$\$0.10$$ for every additional minute talked. This is the variable cost per minute.
The initial value is the value of $$b$$, which is $$24$$. This means that the fixed monthly cost is $24, even if no minutes are used $$(n=0)$$. This represents the base fee for the service.
